00030 static const int DefaultNumberVerticalZones = 4;

00036 static const float DefaultAlpha2 = 0.065f;

00039 static const float DefHPSaturatedIntensity = 48000.0f;

00043 static const float DefTuningConstantCAvgLogRatio = 5.0f;
00044 static const float DefTuningConstantCGammas = 5.0f;
00045 static const float DefEpsilonSB = 0.0001f;
00046 static const float DefEpsilonAvgLogInten = 0.0001f;
00047 static const float DefEpsilonAvgLogRatio = 0.0001f;
00048 static const float DefEpsilonGammas = 0.0001f;
00049 static const float DefContrastTau = 0.03f;
00050 static const float DefSmoothFactorBG = 100.0f;
00051 static const float DefNoiseFrac = 0.5f;

00054 static const float DefDelta = (float) pow(2.0, (double) log2DELTA);

00080 void CExpStatAlgSettings::SetDefaults()
00081 {
00082         // Initialize parameters
00083         ScaleGenes.erase(ScaleGenes.begin(), ScaleGenes.end());
00084         NormGenes.erase(NormGenes.begin(), NormGenes.end());
00085         NormMethod = DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR;
00086         SFMethod = DEFINED_SCALING_FACTOR;
00087         NormFactor = DefaultNormFactor;
00088         ProbeMaskFile = "";
00089         ScaleMaskFile = "";
00090         NormMaskFile = "";
00091         TGT = DefaultTGT;
00092         ScaleFactor = DefaultScaleFactor;
00093         NumberBGCells = DefaultNumBGCells;
00094         NumberHorZones = DefaultNumberHorizonalZones;
00095         NumberVertZones = DefaultNumberVerticalZones;
00096         Alpha1 = DefaultAlpha1;
00097         Alpha2 = DefaultAlpha2;
00098         Tau = DefaultTau;
00099         Gamma1H = DefaultGamma1H;
00100         Gamma1L = DefaultGamma1L;
00101         Gamma2H = DefaultGamma2H;
00102         Gamma2L = DefaultGamma2L;
00103         Perturbation = DefaultPerturbation;
00104         SaturatedIntensity = DefSaturatedIntensity;
00105         HPSaturatedIntensity = DefHPSaturatedIntensity;
00106         Epsilon = DefEpsilon;
00107         TuningConstantCSB = DefTuningConstantCSB;
00108         TuningConstantCAvgLogInten = DefTuningConstantCAvgLogInten;
00109         TuningConstantCAvgLogRatio = DefTuningConstantCAvgLogRatio;
00110         TuningConstantCGammas = DefTuningConstantCGammas;
00111         EpsilonSB = DefEpsilonSB;
00112         EpsilonAvgLogInten = DefEpsilonAvgLogInten;
00113         EpsilonAvgLogRatio = DefEpsilonAvgLogRatio;
00114         EpsilonGammas = DefEpsilonGammas;
00115         ContrastTau = DefContrastTau;
00116         SmoothFactorBG = DefSmoothFactorBG;
00117         NoiseFrac = DefNoiseFrac;
00118         ScaleTau = DefScaleTau;
00119         Delta = DefDelta;
00120         CMultiplier = DefCMultiplier;
00121         BHCoef = DefBHCoef;
00122         BLCoef = DefBLCoef;
00123         BiasCorrect = DefBiasCorrect;
00124         RelConfInterval = DefRelConfInterval;
00125         STP = DefSTP;
00126         IntensityLowPercent = DefIntensityLowPercent;
00127         IntensityHighPercent = DefIntensityHighPercent;
00128 }
